channel.title: Help please :)
channel.description:
I uploaded my client to mopar with all the .java files on it, but then rich deleted it because it didnt defaultly connect to localhost... Thing is that was my only copy of the version of the client with java files. And now ive only got clients with .class files..
does anyone know how to convert .class files back into .java ones?

item.title: Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
